item.title: Report E-2025020036
item.description:

  • City: GARYVILLE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Honeywell International Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0

  • Description: Employees conducted pressure test, test passed. Upon establishing flow employee immediately noticed leak, hit emergency stop and mitigation controls were put in place. Employees installed new gasket and bolts, torqued to proper specs and completed offload safely.
